original_title: Elderly couple and son murdered in Mirigama, suspect arrested
original_body_lines: Police have arrested a suspect over the murder of an elderly couple and their son at Maladeniya, Mirigama.
An 80-year-old man, his 77-year- old wife and their 42-year-old son had been killed in their home by the suspect, police said.
Police revealed that the arrested suspect is a 42-year-old man.
